comments.text:
Lets say I have in the awesomebar http://example.com/foo/alongpathsegment. If i focus the awesomebar (with the cursor at the end), I would like a hotkey to delete path segments.  In fluxbox, if I press ctrl+w, i get what I want: http://example.com/foo/ . In gnome (same Firefox, same profile), this will (not surprisingly) close the tab.  

Is there a way to do this other than my ctrl+w hackery?  Can there be?
